content: Initial investigation shows the leak occurs in the controller reconcile loop when processing large numbers of pods. Memory usage grows linearly with pod count.
Found the root cause! The issue is in the cache implementation - we're not properly releasing references to deleted pods. Working on a fix.
PR is ready for review. Added proper cleanup in the finalizer and improved cache eviction logic. Need performance validation before merging.
Started working on dark mode implementation. Using CSS custom properties approach for easy theme switching. Need to coordinate with design team on color palette.
Dark mode toggle implemented and working in dev environment. Need to validate across different browsers and add user preference persistence.
Flaky validation seems to be related to timing issues in the integration suite. Need to investigate isolation and add proper wait conditions.
